{{n5-section-special-skills}}


This Special Skill marks Troopers who move before the bulk of their own forces and take positions beyond the established allied lines.

{{css_skillbox |purple| FORWARD DEPLOYMENT | DEPLOYMENT SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Superior Deployment, Optional. }}
{{effects}}
* The users of this Special Skill can be deployed beyond the limit of their [[Deployment Zone]]. The number of inches that those Troopers may deploy beyond their Deployment Zone appears between round brackets in their Unit Profile.
{{css_skillbox-end}}


{{Remember-start}}
Troopers cannot be deployed in contact with [[enemy]] and [[neutral]] Models, Markers, or Tokens, or in contact with any mission objective, no matter the Special Skills they have.
{{Remember-end}}
